snippet.title: Anvil Saga - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Anvil Saga is a management sim with RPG elements where you take control of a blacksmith shop amidst the Hundred Years' War. Each decision you make impacts the story and gameplay. 
Wishlist on Steam now: http://bit.ly/AnvilSagaSR

Like Anvil Saga on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AnvilSaga
Follow HeroCraft PC on Twitter: https://twitter.com/HeroCraftPC
Sign up for the alpha: https://www.anvilsaga.com/
